ownerships.owner: THC Miami Restaurant Hospitality Member Corp.

familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of THC Miami Restaurant Hospitality LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned 5415844 in food & beverage related sales income from THC MIAMI RESTAURANT HOSPITALITY LLC, valued at $15,001 - $50,000. Value reported reflects bank account holding only. Restaurant operations at Trump National Doral. Location: Miami, FL
familyMemberEthics.business: THC Miami Restaurant Hospitality LLC (Restaurant Operations)

familyMemberEthics.description: Former chairman/director/president of THC Miami Restaurant Hospitality Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberEthics.business: THC Miami Restaurant Hospitality Member Corp (Pass-Thru Company for THC Miami Restaurant Hospitality LLC (Restaurant Operations))
